title: Regulation and the social licence for medical research
abstract: This paper was published as Medicine, Health Care and Philosophy, 2008, 11 (4), pp. 381-391.  It is available from www.springerlink.com. In this paper, we draw on Everett Hughes’ concepts of professional licence and professional mandate, and on contemporary sociological theory on risk regulation, to explain the emergence of research governance and the kinds of criticism it receives.
